GSD.product_version: versions from v5.13 to before v5.15.53
GSD.description:
ipv6: fix lockdep splat in in6_dump_addrs()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.53 by commit 2930ee1a166df0e12fe9fec4b79cc3dc9634ae45, it was introduced in version v5.13 by commit 88e2ca3080947fe22eb520c1f8231e79a105d011. For more details please see the references link.
